question: Exenatide is a new drug used in diabetes mellitus. Mechanism of action of this drug is:-

question: Which of the following drugs is a direct inhibitor of clotting factor Xa?

(synthetic non-peptide compound which binds reversibly to the catalytic site of thrombin but not to the substrate recognition site).
